input.sentences: my father decided to recreate his childhood town with model trains . he began with the trainyard .
he got a train office and everything .
after he completed it | he showed it to my son .
he showed my son where the old school house use to be .
he then ran a few trains for my son to see .
output.sentences: The miniature train set had several trains that ran through a trainyard and a town.
There was also an office in the caboose of the train.
My son loves to watch the train now that it has been completed.
My son loves to look at the miniature school and little house.
My son was able to run the trains using the remote control.
